messages.title: Three good reasons to back Tony Hill
messages.content:
1. Send a message on Brexit
2. End the cuts to education
3. Safeguard our local NHS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tony Hill campaigned tirelessly to keep Britain in the EU. Like the majority of people in Maidenhead, he voted Remain in the referendum. Every vote Tony Hill gets sends a message to the Conservatives against this disastrous hard Brexit.

As a former successful Headteacher, Tony understands the importance of education. He will end the extreme experiments being carried out on our children by the Conservatives and put the money into reversing the cuts to schools.
Tony Hill will be a champion for local health and care services. With our NHS under threat from further Conservative cuts, we need an MP who will safeguard vital funding.

mentions.candidate: Tony Hill - the best choice as our next MP for Maidenhead
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: With Labour in chaos, only the Liberal Democrats can provide a strong opposition and hold the Government to account on Brexit, schools and the NHS.
mentions.partyLeader: Tim Farron and the Liberal Democrats are the only major party fighting to keep Britain in the single market.

issues.brexitEurope: Tony Hill campaigned tirelessly to keep Britain in the EU. Like the majority of people in Maidenhead, he voted Remain in the referendum.
issues.education: As a former successful Headteacher, Tony understands the importance of education. He will end the extreme experiments being carried out on our children by the Conservatives and put the money into reversing the cuts to schools. These cuts are seeing class sizes increase and fewer teachers, and they must end.
issues.health: Tony Hill will be a champion for local health and care services. With our NHS under threat from further Conservative cuts, we need an MP who will safeguard vital funding.

quotes.text: "Hospital cuts planned in most of England."
"All schools in England likely to face real-term cuts."
"Lib Dems will continue to fight for the single market"

As a former successful Headteacher, Tony understands the importance of education. He will end the extreme experiments being carried out on our children by the Conservatives and put the money into reversing the cuts to schools.
